00203 /* comefrom: moveWorld doEditWindow scoreDoer doMapInFront graphDoer */
00204 void Micropolis::animateTiles()
00205 {
00206     unsigned short tilevalue, tileflags;
00207     unsigned short *tMapPtr;
00208     int i;
00209 
00210     /* Animate whole world */
00211     tMapPtr = (unsigned short *)&(map[0][0]);
00212 
00213     for (i = WORLD_W * WORLD_H; i > 0; i--) {
00214         tilevalue = (*tMapPtr);
00215         if (tilevalue & ANIMBIT) {
00216             tileflags = tilevalue & ALLBITS;
00217             tilevalue &= LOMASK;
00218             tilevalue = animatedTiles[tilevalue];
00219             tilevalue |= tileflags;
00220             (*tMapPtr) = tilevalue;
00221         }
00222         tMapPtr++;
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 int Micropolis::getNextAnimatedTile(int index)
00228 {
00229     if ((index < 0) || (index >= TILE_COUNT)) {
00230         return -1;
00231     }
00232 
00233     return animatedTiles[index];
00234 }
